title: How to Fit Your Body Through an Index Card

steps.headline: Fold the index card in half.
steps.description: Fold it the long way, or "hot-dog style."

steps.headline: Cut a slit on each side near the left and right edges.
steps.description: The slits should be vertical and go down from the fold, NOT from the unfolded edges. Do not cut the ends; leave a bit of space.

steps.headline: Snip off the folded edge.
steps.description: Be careful to not cut the ends, and stop when you reach the slits.

steps.headline: Make more cuts with the scissors.
steps.description: Alternate each cut, one coming from the unfolded edge and then one coming from the folded edge. They should all be parallel to one another.

steps.headline: Open up the card gently.
steps.description: It will unfold into a large hole. If you followed this how-to correctly, it should be large enough for you to step through!
